page.title: 11HOLLYMOUNT KNEESALL
page.content: { Hollymount}is a group of houses in Kneesall village that has been built from 3 barns and a farmhouse. A new bungalow has been built also.The barn and the farmhouse are 200 years old and have got some beams.The materials used were mainly brick and tiles.Now builders are repairing and adding to the original group of farm buildings. Our house is made from a barn and is semi-detached. It is called Meadow Barn. When a group of us went to visit Hollymount we asked in what age Hollymount was built.The reply was that probably it had been first built in{Georgian}times. A lady called Mrs Maskill used to live in the farmhouse at Hollymount before the barns were modernised into houses.The re-building has been going on for one to two years.
